scripts.babel:build:usage:corejs3: npx babel ./index.js --out-file ./dist-corejs3/index.js && echo ' usage 配置 corejs3'
scripts.babel:build:usage:entry: npx babel ./index.js --out-file ./dist-entry/index.js && echo ' 使用entry 配置 corejs3'
scripts.babel:build:corejs2: npx babel ./index.js --out-file ./dist-corejs2/index.js && echo 'usage 配置 corejs2'
